name: Mischief Maker
description:
Join a young girl on her quest to build a flying machine. Combine materials into the parts you need to create your invention.

Controls are as simple as clicking and dragging.

This game was made over a single weekend for Open Jam 2020.

I haven't tested for all platforms. If there's a problem, leave a comment and I'll do what I can to fix incompatibilities, at least for a little while after the jam ends.

Code and Art by AstroPippin

Writing and Music by Sibyl (eglantine)
